name: Hungry Shadow
description:
Game made for MINI JAM: DON'T STAY IN THE DARK in only 2 days, I can't do all the things I would like to do within this time but i did my best, I hope you have fun!

You are a scientist in a space colony lab, trying to escape from a creature that lives in the shadows. Activate the temporary lights at the beginning of the level and never be in the dark.

CONTROLS

  • MOVE: W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys
  • LIGHTS:  Press Space when over the switch.

Game by Róger Goulart (Instagram: @roger_goulart)
